Text: I can't believe the great music you keep putting on, I need to buy you a BEER.

Thank you for this, I just found out that my d/ls of ELP are a complete fuckup with most of the files containing some other song by ELP than stated. Gracenote found that out, though, to my complete surprise, when the tags started to show other titles than the filename.
So thanx again for a chance to repair more easily than renaiming everything.

I will buy you four beers if you keep up the superb music thnx
 sueby

Tnx for the up. Havn't heard them since mid 70's.

I think they were the best among the progressives. They had some punch. The others didn't even have a sense of direction.
awesome job, man! keep it up!
Thanks a lot for this huge collection, but unfortunally most rips are bad. Welcome Back My Friends's almost impossible to hear.
Thank you beerpal. What a far-out flashback I am enjoying with these.
thanks for sharing this classic album
Thank you so much! I will download this now and leave it uploading to disseminate the wonderful work of these guys.
